section.name: UNIT 2: LAWS OF ENERGY
section.summary:
Principle 1: Energy is a physical quantity that follows precise natural laws.

Natural laws create some useful opportunities, such as the ability to convert one form of energy to another. They also impose certain tradeoffs, such as losses that cannot be avoided. These losses, which often show up as waste heat or emissions, are one reason for environmental impacts.

Select the Unit 2 link below to learn more about Principle 1.
